did.unittitle: UMWA District 15 Press Releases and Newspaper Clippings about the "Colorado Strike, 1914" on Microfilm
did.abstract: Press releases and newsclippings concerning the UMW's 1914 Colorado strike.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The United Mine Workers of America, District 15, represents employees of the Colorado fuel and iron company.

The United Mine Workers of America (UMW or UMWA) is a North American labor union best known for representing coal miners. Now the Union also represents truck drivers, health care workers, public employees and manufacturing workers in Canada and the United States.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A negative copy is available upon request.
